parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>TRUE. The post includes "CMF 11240017" at the end, indicating it's likely electoral propaganda.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>TRUE. The post explicitly mentions "Daniela Mihai" and her candidacy for senator, clearly identifying a parliamentary candidate from the PSD party.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>TRUE.  This is a paid Facebook post, inherently designed for wide public reach. The message is not a private communication.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>TRUE. The post urges voters to "Votează Calea Sigură pentru Călărași" (Vote the Safe Path for Călărași), directly advocating for Daniela Mihai's election. The visual elements (image of the candidate, PSD logo) further reinforce this objective.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>FALSE. The content is not journalistic in nature. It lacks objective reporting and focuses solely on promoting the candidate and her party.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>FALSE. The post presents itself as a campaign message, not a personal opinion. The language used ("Calea Sigură," "schimbări în bine") is typical of political campaigning.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>2948803988603171</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers directly to a candidate (Daniela Mihai), is used during the electoral campaign period (judging by the CMF number and the context), has a clear electoral objective (to increase votes for Mihai), and goes beyond simple journalistic reporting. The post's paid nature and targeting within Călărași County further solidify its propagandistic intent.  The presence of the CMF number confirms its status as official campaign material.  While the post mentions Mihai's professional background, this is clearly secondary to its primary purpose of promoting her candidacy.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>Daniela Mihai</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PSD</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
ROGER GRAPHIC DESIGN SRL, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID 2948803988603171) cu conținut electoral, care promovează candidatura Danielei Mihai pentru funcția de senator din partea PSD, folosind imaginea acesteia și îndemnuri explicite la vot ("Votează Calea Sigură pentru Călărași"). Postarea, marcată cu CMF 11240017, depășește limitele jurnalismului, având ca obiectiv clar influențarea votului în favoarea candidatei PSD.  Efectul electoral este evident, vizând creșterea numărului de voturi pentru Daniela Mihai.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
